title: Youth and credit
creator_credit: Tony Wickert, Australian Credit Unions and Summer Hill Films
brief_description: A programme to alert young people to the positive and negative aspects of credit, by giving a comphrensive picture of the credit spectrum, and introducing young people to safe ways of handling credit.
